articles.author: CNN
articles.title: Energy prices are causing chaos in Asia. Here's why the rest of the world should worry - 9News
articles.description: In Sri Lanka, people queue for kilometres to fill a tank of fuel. In Bangladesh, shops shut at 8pm to conserve energy.

articles.title: GrabFood rider dies after colliding with lorry outside Waterway Point - AsiaOne
articles.description: A GrabFood delivery rider was knocked down by a lorry along Punggol Walk on Friday (June 24) morning. Although he was conscious on the way to hospital, the 54-year-old subsequently died from his injuries. In photos shared by Sg Road Vigilante on the same day,…

articles.title: About 170 people test positive for tuberculosis in Jalan Bukit Merah - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Some 30 per cent of 574 residents and workers at 2 Jalan Bukit Merah - or about 170 people - who went through voluntary testing in late May have tested positive for tuberculosis. The Ministry of Health (MOH) said on Friday (June 24) that further t…

articles.author: nutraingredients.com
articles.title: Prevalence of nutritional deficiencies in Asian children needs urgent attention - NutraIngredients.com
articles.description: There is an urgent need for better nutrition among children in South-East Asia who face a ‘triple burden’ of malnutrition, according to a recent study commissioned and funded by FrieslandCampina.
articles.content: The South-East Asian Nutrition Survey (SEANUTS II) canvassed 13,933 children aged six months to 12 years and discovered widespread cases of stunted growth and anaemia in the region and particularly i… [+1416 chars]

articles.title: 'Are ya ready, kids?': Kang Daniel announces collaboration with SpongeBob SquarePants - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The singer will be designed as an animated character in a series of merchandise that will be available for a limited time from Jun 24.
articles.content:
